Header: Attempts made to smuggle in cigarettes foiled
Content: An attempt made to smuggle in foreign cigarettes to the country has been foiled at the Katunayake International Airport. The stock of 14,500 sticks of cigarettes, packed in 72 cartons and 10 packets were hidden in their travelling bags. According to the customs officials the seized cigarettes are estimated be worth nearly 725 thousand rupees. Customs officials said that the two Sri Lankans who attempted to smuggle in the cigarettes have been fined and the haul of cigarettes confiscated.
